ðŸ“– Summary: RE:SEARCHER is a web extension that transforms your browser bookmarks into a personal, full-text searchable knowledge base. It leverages Elasticsearch for powerful querying, supports multiple languages, and saves all data locally. Features include content extraction, syntax highlighting, flexible search results, and organization tools like 'Read Later' and star ratings.
